event.title: last week in Swansea was jailed

data.event: A man authorities say was shot by a state trooper after he tried to hit the trooper and a woman with a car last week in Swansea was jailed Tuesday.
Crolley was a passenger in a 2001 Chevrolet Cavalier that was stopped March 16 on suspicion of DUI on S.C. 6 near U.S. 321, authorities said.
